Module net.etf.project
Package net.etf.project.serialization

Class VehicleSerializer

java.lang.Object
net.etf.project.serialization.VehicleSerializer
public class VehicleSerializer extends Object
This class handles the serialization and deserialization of Vehicle objects.

  • Method Details

    • serializeVehicle

      public static void serializeVehicle(Vehicle vehicle, String outputFolder)
      Serializes a single Vehicle object to a binary file.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - The vehicle to be serialized.
      outputFolder - The folder where the serialized file will be saved.

    • serializeVehiclesWithMalfunctions

      public static void serializeVehiclesWithMalfunctions(List<Vehicle> vehicles, String outputFolder)
      Serializes a list of vehicles that have malfunctions to individual binary files.
      Parameters:
      vehicles - A list of vehicles to be serialized.
      outputFolder - The folder where the serialized files will be saved.

    • deserializeVehicle

      public static Vehicle deserializeVehicle(String filePath)
      Deserializes a single Vehicle object from a binary file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file from which the vehicle will be deserialized.
      Returns:
      The deserialized Vehicle object, or null if an error occurs.

    • deserializeVehicles

      public static List<Vehicle> deserializeVehicles(String inputFolder)
      Deserializes all Vehicle objects from a folder containing binary files.
      Parameters:
      inputFolder - The folder containing the binary files for deserialization.
      Returns:
      A list of deserialized Vehicle objects.
